div.p: The PHP development team announces the release of PHP 5.5.0alpha3. This release adds few features and fix some bugs from alpha2. All users of PHP are encouraged to test this version carefully, and report any bugs in the bug tracking system.
div.strong: THIS IS A DEVELOPMENT PREVIEW - DO NOT USE IT IN PRODUCTION!
div.p: PHP 5.5.0 Alpha 3 comes with new features and improvements such as (incomplete list) :

ul.li: New cURL functions and options such as curl_escape(), curl_multi_setopt(), curl_multi_strerror(), curl_pause(), curl_reset()...
Few bug fixes in mysqlnd and core

div.p: You can read the full list of changes in the NEWS file contained in the release archive.
For source downloads of PHP 5.5.0 Alpha 3 please visit the download page, Windows binaries can be found on windows.php.net/qa/.
